text.section: The commission shall employ an executive director who shall serve at the pleasure of the commission. The executive director shall be familiar with the problems of the deaf and hard of hearing.

law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982.
